about_the_game:
Add CA2S: Savage Bees to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

The humanoid planet known as Neg-nin is being taken over by giant insect-type creatures called Exes. In response to the attack, the planet's scientists have built special aircraft in order to repel the invasion.
However, the Exes' secret weapon is nearly complete. Hurry! You must eliminate the Exes army and save the planet!

Players: 1-2 Player Co-Op
Genre: Shooter
Versions: Japanese & English
